text: Ūst, ki peşopeşi [ʙoroni] rahmataş ʙodhoro ʙaşoratʙaxş mefiristad, to aʙrhoi sanginʙorro [ʙar dūş] kaşand [va] onro ʙa sūji zamini [xuşku] murda mefiristem,on goh ʙar on [sarzamin] oʙ furū meʙorem va [az ʙarakati] on [oʙ] har guna mevae ʙarmeovarem. Ba in son, murdagonro [niz az qaʙr] xoriç mesozem, ʙoşad, ki pand gired
